text: A taula ('table' in Catalan) is a stone monument in the shape of a T. It is found on the Balearic Islands of Minorca. They were built by the Talaiotic culture sometime between 1000 BC and 300 BC. Their meaning is unknown but it was probably made for either religious and/or astronomical purposes. ==References== == Other websites == * The Taulas of Menorca Category:Archaeological sites in Europe Category:1st millennium BC buildings and structures Category:Balearic Islands
title: Taula
